Gopal Sharma

University of Massachussets, Amherst

I am Ph.D. student working on Computer Vision, at CICS UMass-Amherst. I am advised by Evangelis Kalogerakis, and Subhransu Maji. My areas of interests are Deep Learning, Probabilistic Graphical Models and Deep Reinforcement Learning. Previosuly I have worked with Bernard Ghanem
